verses.verse: In the tenth <S%H6224><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> in the tenth <S%H6224><s%> [month, <S%H2320><s%>] on the twelfth <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> of the month, the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> your face <S%H6440><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and prophesy <S%H5012><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> him and against <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

"Speak <S%H1696><s%> and say, <S%H559><s%> 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am against <S%H5921><s%> you, Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> The great <S%H1419><s%> monster <S%H8577><s%> that lies <S%H7257><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of his rivers, <S%H2975><s%> That has said, <S%H559><s%> 'My Nile <S%H2975><s%> is mine, and I myself <S%H589><s%> have made <S%H6213><s%> it.'

"And I shall put <S%H5414><s%> hooks <S%H2397><s%> in your jaws, <S%H3895><s%> And I shall make the fish <S%H1710><s%> of your rivers <S%H2975><s%> cling <S%H1692><s%> to your scales. <S%H7193><s%> And I shall bring <S%H5927><s%> you up out of the midst <S%H8432><s%> of your rivers, <S%H2975><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> the fish <S%H1710><s%> of your rivers <S%H2975><s%> will cling <S%H1692><s%> to your scales. <S%H7193><s%>

"And I shall abandon <S%H5203><s%> you to the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> you and all <S%H3605><s%> the fish <S%H1710><s%> of your rivers; <S%H2975><s%> You will fall <S%H5307><s%> on the open <S%H6440><s%> field; <S%H7704><s%> you will not be brought <S%H622><s%> together <S%H622><s%> or gathered. <S%H6908><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> you for food <S%H402><s%> to the beasts <S%H9130><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> and to the birds <S%H5775><s%> of the sky. <S%H8064><s%>

"Then all <S%H3605><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> Because <S%H3282><s%> they have been <S%H1961><s%> [only] a staff <S%H4938><s%> [made] of reed <S%H7070><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

"When they took <S%H8610><s%> hold <S%H8610><s%> of you with the hand, <S%H3709><s%> You broke <S%H7533><s%> and tore <S%H1234><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> their hands; <S%H3802><s%> And when they leaned <S%H8172><s%> on you, You broke <S%H7665><s%> and made all <S%H3605><s%> their loins <S%H4975><s%> quake. <S%H5975><s%>"

'Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I shall bring <S%H935><s%> upon you a sword, <S%H2719><s%> and I shall cut <S%H3772><s%> off <S%H3772><s%> from you man <S%H120><s%> and beast. <S%H929><s%>

"And the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> will become <S%H1961><s%> a desolation <S%H8077><s%> and waste. <S%H2723><s%> Then they will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord. <S%H3068><s%> Because <S%H3282><s%> you said, <S%H559><s%> 'The Nile <S%H2975><s%> is mine, and I have made <S%H6213><s%> [it,]'

therefore, <S%H3651><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am against <S%H413><s%> you and against <S%H413><s%> your rivers, <S%H2975><s%> and I will make <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> an utter <S%H9165><s%> waste <S%H9165><s%> and desolation, <S%H8077><s%> from Migdol <S%H4024><s%> [to] Syene <S%H5482><s%> and even to the border <S%H1366><s%> of Ethiopia. <S%H3568><s%>

"A man's foot <S%H7272><s%> will not pass <S%H5674><s%> through it, and the foot <S%H7272><s%> of a beast <S%H929><s%> will not pass <S%H5674><s%> through it, and it will not be inhabited <S%H3427><s%> for forty <S%H705><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>

"So I shall make <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> a desolation <S%H8077><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of desolated <S%H8074><s%> lands. <S%H776><s%> And her cities, <S%H5892><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of cities <S%H5892><s%> that are laid <S%H2717><s%> waste, <S%H2117><s%> will be desolate <S%H8077><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> years; <S%H8141><s%> and I shall scatter <S%H6327><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%> and disperse <S%H2219><s%> them among the lands. <S%H776><s%>"

'For thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "At the end <S%H7093><s%> of forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> I shall gather <S%H6908><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> from the peoples <S%H5971><s%> among whom <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> they were scattered. <S%H6327><s%>

"And I shall turn <S%H7725><s%> the fortunes <S%H7622><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> and shall make <S%H7725><s%> them return <S%H7725><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of Pathros, <S%H6624><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of their origin; <S%H4351><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> they will be a lowly <S%H8217><s%> kingdom. <S%H4467><s%>

"It will be the lowest <S%H8217><s%> of the kingdoms; <S%H4467><s%> and it will never <S%H3808><s%> again <S%H5750><s%> lift <S%H5375><s%> itself up above <S%H5921><s%> the nations. <S%H1471><s%> And I shall make <S%H4591><s%> them so small <S%H4591><s%> that they will not rule <S%H7287><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the nations. <S%H1471><s%>

"And it will never <S%H3808><s%> again <S%H5750><s%> be the confidence <S%H4009><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> bringing <S%H2142><s%> to mind <S%H2142><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of their having turned <S%H6437><s%> to Egypt. Then they will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord <S%H136><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%>"' "

Now in the twenty-seventh year, <S%H8141><s%> in the first <S%H7223><s%> [month, <S%H2320><s%>] on the first <S%H259><s%> of the month, the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> made his army <S%H2428><s%> labor <S%H5656><s%> hard <S%H1419><s%> against <S%H413><s%> Tyre; <S%H6865><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> head <S%H7218><s%> was made <S%H7139><s%> bald, <S%H7139><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> shoulder <S%H3802><s%> was rubbed <S%H4803><s%> bare. <S%H4803><s%> But he and his army <S%H2428><s%> had <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> wages <S%H7939><s%> from Tyre <S%H6865><s%> for the labor <S%H5656><s%> that he had performed <S%H5647><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> it."

Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I shall give <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> to Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon. <S%H894><s%> And he will carry <S%H5375><s%> off <S%H5375><s%> her wealth, <S%H1995><s%> and capture <S%H7997><s%> her spoil <S%H7998><s%> and seize <S%H962><s%> her plunder; <S%H957><s%> and it will be wages <S%H7939><s%> for his army. <S%H2428><s%>

"I have given <S%H5414><s%> him the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> [for] his labor <S%H6468><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he performed, <S%H5647><s%> because <S%H834><s%> they acted <S%H6213><s%> for Me," declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%>

"On that day <S%H3117><s%> I shall make a horn <S%H7161><s%> sprout <S%H6779><s%> for the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and I shall open <S%H5414><s%> <S%H6610><s%> your mouth <S%H6310><s%> in their midst. <S%H8432><s%> Then they will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>"
